about_section.description: At Fast Clean Service your car will receive the highest quality steam cleaning and detailing, on location or at our location. Thanks to advanced techniques and high-quality products, we clean and protect your car with care and precision.

services_section.title: OUR SERVICES
services_section.description: At Fast Clean Service, we offer a wide range of professional cleaning and detailing services to keep your car in top condition. From interior to exterior, we have the expertise and techniques to take care of every detail of your vehicle.

services.title: Steam Cleaning Interior & Exterior
services.description: A deep cleaning that removes dirt, stains and unpleasant odours, without harsh chemicals. Our environmentally friendly steam technology leaves your car fresh and hygienic.
bullets: Safe for fabric, leather and plastic
services.description2: 📅 Book now and give your car the fresh start it deserves.

services.title: Paint Protection & Coatings
services.description: Protect your car's paint and make it shine like new again. Our professional wax and coating treatments provide long‑lasting protection against dirt, UV radiation and weather influences.

services.title: Polishing & Headlight Restoration
services.description: Dull or yellowed headlights age your car and reduce visibility. With our headlight restoration service, we thoroughly polish your headlights, remove yellowing and restore the original brightness.
bullets: Removes dullness and yellowing for brighter light
Better visibility and a fresher look

questions.question: Where can I have my car cleaned?
questions.answer: You can choose to have it cleaned on location or visit our location. Both options offer the same high-quality service.

questions.question: How long does a cleaning take?
What is the difference between the cleaning packages?
answer: Standard: Basic cleaning for interior or exterior.
Deluxe: Thorough deep cleaning with extra protection.
Premium: Full detailing, polishing and paint sealing.

questions.question: How long does a ceramic coating last?
questions.answer: Depending on the coating chosen, your paint will remain protected against dirt, UV and weather influences for up to 3 years.

questions.question: Do you need electricity or water on location?
questions.answer: No, we do not need a power or water connection. Is this available? Then you can indicate this when booking.

questions.question: How quickly can I make an appointment?
questions.answer: You can usually get an appointment within 1 to 5 days. During busy periods the waiting time may be a little longer.

questions.question: My car is extremely dirty, what now?
questions.answer: For heavily soiled vehicles, we recommend deluxe or premium detailing. Contact us if you are unsure about the best option.

questions.question: Do you offer cleaning for commercial vehicles and fleets?
questions.answer: Yes! We have special fleet services for companies, including on-site maintenance.

questions.question: How can I pay?
questions.answer: You can easily pay via iDEAL, Credit Card, Apple Pay, Google Pay & Cryptocurrency

questions.question: Do you offer subscriptions?
questions.answer: Yes, with a subscription your car will always stay clean at a fixed, affordable rate.

decorativeText.text2: On Location or At Our Branch

about.title: About Fast Clean Service – Premium AutorCare & Detailing
about.description:
Fast Clean Service has been delivering high-quality detailing and car cleaning since 2018. Our focus? Perfection in every detail. Whether you choose to have your car cleaned on location or bring it to our location – we guarantee a showroom-worthy finish.
We distinguish ourselves through flexible, thorough cleaning – anytime, anywhere. With advanced high-pressure steam technology, we clean vehicles down to the smallest detail. This method effectively removes dirt, grease and bacteria, even from the most stubborn spots, without causing damage. We offer efficient, professional service for all types of vehicles – at your location or at our location.

quality_as_priority.title: Quality as Priority
quality_as_priority.description: We deliver quality in every detail – with equipped service vans and high-end techniques for a flawless result, everywhere and always.

our_values.title: Our Values
our_values.description: Every car deserves top care. We stand for reliability, honesty and delivering consistent quality – for everyone.

experts_in_detail.title: Experts in Detail
experts_in_detail.description: Our certified team works with advanced steam, polishing and coating techniques for visible and lasting results.

our_successes.title: Our Successes
our_successes.description: Thousands of satisfied customers. Our treatments extend the life of vehicles and restore showroom shine – time and time again.

detailing_shop.title: DETAILING SHOP
detailing_shop.description: Experience the ultimate in car care, available at our professional detailing shop.

features.title: Professional Equipment
features.subpara: Our detailing shop is equipped with cutting-edge tools:

features.title: Expert Technicians
features.subpara: Our certified detailing experts bring unparalleled skill to every job:

founder_section.title: MEET THE FOUNDER
founder_section.name: Felicio Perk
founder_section.bio: Visit us, gain professional service of lower risk, top-tier work quality.

cta.text: See the difference for yourself! Book today.

cta_section.title: Ready for a car that shines like new?
cta_section.description: Book online now and see why customers keep coming back to Fast Clean Service.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.subtitle: Always Available for You
contact.description: Do you have a question or would you like to make an appointment? Simply contact us! Fast Clean Service are ready to help you with professional steam cleaning and car detailing, both on location and at our branch.

working_hours.title: WORKING HOURS
working_hours.description: We work by appointment only! Would you like to visit our location? Or a cleaning on location? Make an appointment in advance to guarantee availability.

questions.question: Do I need to make an appointment to visit your location?
questions.answer: Yes, we work by appointment only. This prevents long waiting times and ensures that we have enough time for your vehicle. Easily make an appointment via our website.

questions.question: How can I make an appointment?
questions.answer: You can make an appointment via our online booking page, by telephone or via WhatsApp. We advise you to book in advance due to the crowds.

questions.question: Can you be reached via WhatsApp?
questions.answer: Yes, we can be reached via WhatsApp for questions, quotes and bookings. Click on the WhatsApp button on our website to contact us directly.

questions.question: What are your opening hours?
questions.answer: We are open 7 days a week from 08:00 – 17:30, but by appointment only. Contact us for availability.

questions.question: Can I bring my car to you without an appointment?
questions.answer: No, we work by appointment only. This prevents waiting times and ensures that we can offer the best service.

questions.question: Do you offer home service?
questions.answer: Yes. We are a mobile detailing service and come to your home, work or other desired location. The first 30 km from our location are free; after that we charge a small mileage fee.

questions.question: What is your drop-off location for mobile service?
questions.answer: Our drop-off location is Old Blaauwweg 14 1521 RN Wormerveer. From here we charge any additional mileage costs.

questions.question: Can I contact you for a business collaboration?
questions.answer: Certainly! We work with companies, fleets, leasing companies and garages. Send us an email or call us for a customized quote.

questions.question: How quickly can I expect a response to my request?
questions.answer: We usually respond to emails and WhatsApp messages within 24 hours. For urgent questions, it is best to call us.

questions.question: What if I want to change or cancel my appointment?
questions.answer: No problem! Let us know at least 24 hours in advance, then we will schedule a new time together.

fleetcare.title: Business services
fleetcare.subtitle: Professional Maintenance for your Fleet
fleetcare.description: Fast Clean Service offers customized solutions for business customers who value professionalism, quality and reliability. Whether you manage a fleet, rent out cars, run a taxi or transport service, or organize events – we ensure that your vehicles are always presentable.
fleetcare.wdesc: We understand that a well-maintained fleet is crucial to the image and success of your company. Our comprehensive, flexible solutions save you time, money and ensure that your vehicles are always in optimum condition.

services.title: Fleet management
services.description: We make sure that your fleet always looks clean, well-maintained and professional. Whether it's cars, vans or trucks - we take care of everything down to the last detail.

services.title: Brand dealers & garages
services.description: For dealers and garages, appearance is essential. Our detailing services contribute to a premium presentation of new and used vehicles. From paint corrections to showroom treatments; we make the difference for your customers.

services.title: Leasing & rental companies
services.description: We keep lease and rental cars in top condition, increase customer satisfaction and help to maximize the residual value of your vehicles. Our service fits perfectly with your rental process and ensures efficiency and representativeness of your vehicles.

fleetcare.quality_focus: We focus on high quality using the latest techniques and environmentally friendly products. Your vehicles stay in top condition for longer, which ensures a sustainable and professional fleet.

questions.question: Can I schedule fixed appointments for my fleet?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer flexible subscriptions and fixed maintenance times.

questions.question: How does billing work for business customers?
questions.answer: Business customers receive a single, clear monthly invoice with VAT details. Payment can be made via iDEAL, invoice, or direct debit.

questions.question: Can you work on-site?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Our mobile service works at your business location or event venue.

questions.question: What types of vehicles do you clean?
questions.answer: We clean and detail all vehicle types, including cars, vans, trucks, and more.

questions.question: Can I get customized packages?
questions.answer: Yes, we are happy to create customized packages that meet your needs and budget.

questions.question: Can you efficiently service large fleets?
questions.answer: Yes, we are fully equipped to professionally clean and maintain medium to very large fleets, with tight scheduling and consistent quality.

questions.question: Do you also offer protective treatments for commercially used vehicles?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer paint sealants, ceramic coatings, and interior treatments that are perfect for vehicles that are used intensively or need to remain presentable.

questions.question: Is it possible to temporarily register additional vehicles or one-off assignments?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Whether it's for peak periods, seasonal changes, or one-off projects – we flexibly adapt our services to your situation.

questions.question: How quickly can I get started?
questions.answer: Depending on our schedule, you can start using our services within a few days.

questions.question: Are there any benefits for regular customers?
questions.answer: Yes, business customers benefit from customized packages that meet their needs and budget.

other_vehicles.title: OTHER VEHICLES
other_vehicles.subtitle: Specialized Cleaning and Care of All Types of Vehicles

description.text: Precision Cleaning and Maintenance for Aircraft
Comprehensive Cleaning and Maintenance for Campers
Heavy-Duty Detailing and Professional Service for Trucks

sections.heading: Motorcycles, Scooters & Bicycles
sections.text: Two-wheelers also deserve professional attention. At Fast Clean Service, we thoroughly clean motorcycles, scooters and (electric) bicycles with steam, including the chain, wheels and rims. Plastic parts are nourished and protected against aging, and paintwork can be polished if desired. For long-term protection, we apply a high-quality coating. This not only keeps your two-wheeler looking neat, but it is also more resistant to dirt, rain and daily influences. Ideal for enthusiasts and daily use.

sections.heading: Boats
sections.text: A boat needs extra protection due to sun, salt and water. Fast Clean Service offers specialized cleaning and care for boats, both on the outside and the interior. We remove limescale and rust traces with a targeted anti-limescale and anti-rust treatment, and thoroughly clean the entire surface with steam. The inside of the boat can also be professionally cleaned, including upholstery, floors and plastic parts. Metal and plastic surfaces on deck are polished for a neat appearance. We can also treat the boat with a durable coating that protects against UV radiation, salt and moisture. This keeps your boat in top condition, inside and out.

sections.heading: Campers & Caravans
sections.text: Campers and caravans require thorough and careful cleaning, both inside and out. Fast Clean Service provides a complete steam cleaning of the exterior and interior, including deep cleaning and roof cleaning. We remove stubborn dirt such as insect remains, resin and road pollution. For long-term protection against UV radiation, rain and dirt, you can opt for a special coating. This keeps your camper or caravan in top condition, ready for every season and every trip.

sections.heading: Trucks
sections.text: For trucks, we offer a professional cabin treatment that ensures a fresh, representative appearance. We thoroughly clean the entire cabin with steam, including sills, windows, mirrors and hard-to-reach corners. The dashboard, cockpit and storage compartments are carefully cleaned and freed of dust, grease and stains. Plastic parts are fed for a neat, neat finish and longer life. Ideal for transport companies or independent drivers who want to keep their vehicle clean, hygienic and professional.

sections.heading: Airplanes
sections.text: Airplanes also deserve a thorough and hygienic cleaning. Fast Clean Service offers steam cleaning of the entire interior, with seats, walls, floors and storage compartments being treated professionally. Thanks to our steam technology, dirt, bacteria and unpleasant odours are effectively removed, without the use of aggressive agents. Ideal for private jets, sports aircraft or aircraft that regularly transport passengers. We ensure a fresh and representative cabin, ready for the next flight.

subscriptions.title: SUBSCRIPTIONS
subscriptions.subtitle: Worry-Free Maintenance for your Vehicle
subscriptions.description: With our Fast Clean Service Subscription Plans we offer a flexible and economical way to always keep your vehicle in top condition. Choose from several options tailored to your needs and driving style, with regular maintenance and exclusive benefits.

features.title: Expert Care
features.description: Periodic cleaning and maintenance of both interior and exterior. Better rates for returning customers.

features.title: Flexibility
features.description: Flexibility in choosing the desired frequency (monthly, quarterly, etc.).

cta.text: Choose one of our subscription options and enjoy convenience and quality, without a hassle!
points: Always a clean and well-maintained car, hassle-free
Cancelable on a monthly basis (or more affordable with an annual subscription)
Perfect for those who want to keep their car in top condition consistently.

questions.question: How often is my car cleaned with a subscription?
questions.answer: You choose: every 4, 8, or 12 weeks.

questions.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
questions.answer: Via your own customer account on our website. Choose the location, day, and time yourself.

questions.question: Can I cancel before the end?
questions.answer: Yes. Monthly subscriptions can be canceled monthly after 3 cleanings. Annual subscriptions automatically expire after the end.

questions.question: Can I share my subscription with someone else?
questions.answer: No, each subscription is linked to a single license plate and owner.

questions.question: What if I'm unable to attend?
questions.answer: You can reschedule your appointment free of charge up to 24 hours beforehand. After that, we charge a fixed no-show fee of €150.

questions.question: How do I pay for my cleaning subscription?
questions.answer: After completing the application form, payment will be processed via direct debit.

questions.question: On which days can I make an appointment?
questions.answer: You can make an appointment during our business hours. See the contact page for more information.

questions.question: Can I switch between locations?
questions.answer: Yes, you can choose for each appointment whether you want service on-site or at our location.

questions.question: What happens if I miss my appointment?
questions.answer: Then your appointment will be canceled and we will charge a no-show fee.

questions.question: Do I receive an invoice with a subscription?
questions.answer: Yes, you automatically receive an invoice with every payment. Also suitable for business customers.

definitions.title: Article 1: Definitions
content: Order: Any agreement between the Customer and Fast Clean Service, whereby Fast Clean Service cleans vehicles for a fee.
Customer: The natural person or legal entity that has a vehicle cleaned by Fast Clean Service.
Fast Clean Service: The contractor, registered with the Chamber of Commerce under number 70208085, located at Omweg 38, 1566 HP Assendelft.

articles.title: Article 2: Applicability
content: These general terms and conditions apply to all quotations, services and agreements between Fast Clean Service and the Customer, unless expressly agreed otherwise in writing.

articles.title: Article 3: Appointments & Cancellation
content: Appointments can be cancelled up to 24 hours before the start of the appointment. In that case, the customer will receive the full amount paid as store credit, to be used for a future booking.
In case of cancellation within 24 hours before the start or in case of a no‑show, the full costs of the booked cleaning will be charged.
Fast Clean Service reserves the right to reschedule appointments free of charge in case of bad weather conditions or force majeure.

articles.title: Article 4: Travel surcharge
content: The standard departure point for mobile services is Omweg 38, 1566 HP Assendelft. If a franchise location is closer, this will be used as the departure point.
No additional costs will be charged for distances up to 30 km.
For distances above 30 km, €0.60 per additional kilometre will be charged.
The distance is automatically calculated based on the customer address provided.

articles.title: Article 5: Payment & Invoice
content: Payment must always be made in advance via the website.
Invoices are automatically sent after payment has been completed. Accepted payment methods via Stripe: iDEAL, Visa, Mastercard, Apple Pay, Google Pay.
Accepted payment methods via Coinbase (crypto): Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Solana (SOL).

articles.title: Article 6: Liability
content: Fast Clean Service is not liable for existing damage or damage to sensitive vehicle parts.
No guarantee is given for complete removal of stains or scratches.
In the case of intensive treatments, such as polishing and deep cleaning, the execution is at the customer's risk.

articles.title: Article 7: Complaints
content: Complaints must be reported immediately after the work has been carried out.
Complaints reported later will only be processed if there are demonstrable shortcomings.

articles.title: Article 8: Right of withdrawal
content: The services of Fast Clean Service fall under customisation and are excluded from the statutory right of withdrawal as soon as the work has started or been carried out.

articles.title: Article 9: Access & Workspace
content: The customer must ensure sufficient workspace and accessibility of the vehicle, so that the work can be carried out safely and efficiently.

articles.title: Article 10: Use of Images
content: Fast Clean Service reserves the right to use images of work carried out for marketing purposes, unless the customer objects to this before the start of the service.

articles.title: Article 11: Applicable law
content: All legal relationships with Fast Clean Service are exclusively governed by Dutch law.
Any disputes will be submitted to the competent court in Amsterdam.

paragraphs: This Privacy Policy describes Fast Clean Service's policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information when you use our Services. It explains your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
We use your personal information to provide and improve our Service. By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information as described in this policy.

articles.title: Interpretation and Definitions
content: Interpretation
Capitalized words have the meanings defined below. The following definitions have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in the singular or plural.
Definitions
"Account" means a unique account created for you to access our Service.
"Company" means Fast Clean Service, Omweg 38, 1566 HP Assendelft.
"Cookies" means small files placed on your device by a website.
"Country": Netherlands.
"Device": any device that can be used to access our service, such as a computer or smartphone.
"Personal Data": information relating to an identified or identifiable person.
"Service": the Fast Clean Service website, accessible via https://fast-clean-service.onrender.com/
"Service Provider": any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the company.
"Usage Data": data collected automatically when using the service.
"You": the person using the service or representing the company.

articles.title: Data Collection and Use
content: Types of Data Collected
Personal Data
While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including:
Email address
First and last name
Phone number
License plate number
Location data for travel cost calculation
Payment information (for processing via Stripe or Coinbase only – not stored by us)
Use of Your Data
We use your personal data for the following purposes:
To provide and administer our services
For customer support
To contact you regarding bookings
To process payments via Stripe or Coinbase
For marketing purposes, only if you have explicitly consented to this
To improve our services

articles.title: Cookies
content: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze our website performance, and display tailored content. You can choose to decline cookies through your browser settings.

articles.title: Sharing Your Data
content: We do not share your data with third parties, unless this is necessary for the performance of our service (such as with payment providers), or if required by law.

articles.title: Data Security
content: The security of your information is important to us. We use industry standard security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure.

articles.title: Your Rights
content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Please contact us at info@fastcleanservice.nl for any requests regarding your information.

articles.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We advise you to review this policy periodically. Changes are effective when they are posted on this page.

articles.title: Contact
content: Fast Clean Service
Omweg 38, 1566 HP Assendelft
Email: info@fastcleanservice.nl
